mapper.update: update l_grainattr set grainattrid=grainattrid ,grainattrcode=#{grainattrcode} ,grainattrname=#{grainattrname} ,gbgrainattrcode=#{gbgrainattrcode} ,orderno=#{orderno} where grainattrid=#{grainattrid}

update l_grainattr set grainattrid=grainattrid ,grainattrcode=#{grainattrcode} ,grainattrname=#{grainattrname} ,gbgrainattrcode=#{gbgrainattrcode} ,orderno=#{orderno} where 1=1 and grainattrid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and grainattrid =#{Where_Id} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and grainattrcode=#{Where_grainattrcode} and grainattrname=#{Where_grainattrname} and gbgrainattrcode=#{Where_gbgrainattrcode} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainattrcode "grainattrcode", t.grainattrname "grainattrname", t.gbgrainattrcode "gbgrainattrcode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grainattr t where grainattrid=#{grainattrid}

select t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainattrcode "grainattrcode", t.grainattrname "grainattrname", t.gbgrainattrcode "gbgrainattrcode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grainattr t where 1=1 and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainattrcode=#{grainattrcode} and t.grainattrname=#{grainattrname} and t.gbgrainattrcode=#{gbgrainattrcode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainattrcode "grainattrcode", t.grainattrname "grainattrname", t.gbgrainattrcode "gbgrainattrcode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grainattr t where 1=1 and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainattrcode=#{grainattrcode} and t.grainattrname=#{grainattrname} and t.gbgrainattrcode=#{gbgrainattrcode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
mapper.delete: delete from l_grainattr where 1=1 and grainattrid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and grainattrid =#{Where_Id} and grainattrid=#{Where_grainattrid} and grainattrcode=#{Where_grainattrcode} and grainattrname=#{Where_grainattrname} and gbgrainattrcode=#{Where_gbgrainattrcode} and orderno=#{Where_orderno}
mapper.select: select t.grainattrid "grainattrid", t.grainattrcode "grainattrcode", t.grainattrname "grainattrname", t.gbgrainattrcode "gbgrainattrcode", t.orderno "orderno" from l_grainattr t where 1=1 and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainattrcode like #{grainattrcode} and t.grainattrname=#{grainattrname} and t.gbgrainattrcode=#{gbgrainattrcode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}

select count(*) from l_grainattr t where 1=1 and t.grainattrid=#{grainattrid} and t.grainattrid!=#{NoId} and t.grainattrcode=#{grainattrcode} and t.grainattrname like #{grainattrname} and t.gbgrainattrcode=#{gbgrainattrcode} and t.orderno=#{orderno}
SELECT COUNT(*) from l_grainattr where 1=1 and grainattrname=#{grainattrname} and grainattrid!=#{grainattrid}
